rukus.text: Shinko suru mono yo, moshi anata gataga arra o osorerunaraba, kare wa anata gata ni shikibetsu o atae, anata gata no shoaku o shometsu shi yurushite kudasa reru. Hontoni arra wa idaina onkei no omode ara reru

Mata fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata (muhanmado) ni taishi ikaga ni sakubo shita ka o omoiokoshi nasai. Anata o kokin shi, aruiwa satsugai shi, aruiwa mata hochiku shiyou to shita. Kare-ra wa sakubo shitaga, arra mo mata keiryaku o megurase rareta. Hontoni arra wa mottomo sugureta keiryaku-sha de ara reru

Mata waga shirushi ga kare-ra ni dokuju sa reta toki, kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa (sakini) kiite iru. Moshi watashi-tachi ga nozomunaraba, korera to onaji koto ga ierudearou. Hontoni kore wa, mukashi no monogatari nisuginai

Mata kare-ra ga ko itta toki o omoi nasai. `Arra yo, moshi kore ga hontoni anata kara no shinridearunaraba, watashi-tachi no ue ni ten kara ishi (no ame) o furase, mata watashi-tachi ni itamashi chobatsu o ka shite kudasai
Daga arra wa, anata ga kare-ra no naka ni iru ma, chobatsu o kare-ra ni kudasa renakatta. Mata kare-ra ga o yurushi o koute iru ma wa, shobatsu sa renakatta

Kare-ra wa seinaru masujido no kanrisha demonai no ni,(arra no shimo be o) soko ni hairemai to samatageta koto ni taishite, arra ga kare-ra o shobatsu sa rezu ni okanai. (Shin no) kanrisha wa (omoni taishi) gimu o hatasu mono dakedearu. Daga kare-ra no oku wa sore ga wakaranai
(Arra no)-ka ni okeru kare-ra no reihai-buri wa, tada Ro fue o fuite ryote de hakushu suru nisuginai. Anata gata wa fushinjindeatta nodakara chobatsu o ajiwae

Hontoni shinjinai-sha-tachi wa arra no michi kara (hitobito o) samatageru tame ni, sono zai shi o tsuiyashite iru. Sore o tsuiyasa se nasai. Mamonaku soreha kare-ra no kuno to nari, sono chu kare-ra wa seifuku sa reyou. Korera fushinjin-sha wa jigoku ni atsume rarerudearou

Sore wa arra ga, zenryona mono kara jaakuna mono o kubetsu sa reru tame de, kare wa jaakuna mono o tsugitsugi to tsumikasane issho ni shite, jigoku ni nagekoma reru. Korera no mono koso shippai-shadearu
